name: Free Online Image Upscaler (RealCUGAN) - ATools
description: Free online image upscaler with 2×/3× enlargement. Uses RealCUGAN (WASM local CPU) when available, otherwise falls back to high-quality resize.
seoDescription: Free online image upscaler powered by RealCUGAN-ncnn-webassembly (WebAssembly). Upscale anime/illustration-like images by 2× or 3× with denoise/restore presets, running locally in your browser without uploads. If the environment cannot enable Cross-Origin Isolation (COOP/COEP) and SharedArrayBuffer, it falls back to a high-quality resize mode for compatibility.

ui.hint: Image upscaler: uses RealCUGAN (WebAssembly, local CPU) when available (no uploads). If unsupported, it falls back to high-quality resize.
ui.notReadyDesc: The runtime is still loading. Please try again shortly.
ui.crossOriginIsolatedDesc: RealCUGAN (threads) requires SharedArrayBuffer. Open under Cross-Origin Isolation (set COOP/COEP response headers). Otherwise switch to “High-quality resize”.
ui.unsupportedDesc: Use the latest Chrome/Firefox. If you cannot enable Cross-Origin Isolation, switch to “High-quality resize”.
ui.noteBody: AI upscaling can be CPU- and memory-intensive. Desktop browsers are recommended. Everything runs locally with no uploads.
